content: The first set of IHE Profiles updated for FHIR R4 is out for public comment. See the notification https://mailchi.mp/ihe/ihe-iti-pcc-tf-supplements-published-for-public-comment-2019-01-11?e=f71f998cbe

Reminder to review and comment on the IHE priority set of Profiles using FHIR -- MHD, PDQm, QEDm, mCSD, and Appendix Z. Included in the priority is mXDE which didn't need to be revised as it just orchistrates MHD and QEDm with Provenance.
